name: lov-ns
description: Recommended RDF vocabularies for Linked Open Data.
author: Patrick Golden

scripts.update-lov: test "$(git diff --shortstat)" && echo 'Commit all changes before updating dataset.' || (node generate.js && npm run commit-update)
scripts.commit-update: git add -A && git commit -m "Update data from LOV." && npm run bump-version-after-update || echo 'No changes to LOV dataset'
scripts.bump-version-after-update: test "Update data from LOV." = "$(git log -1 --format='s')" && (test "$(git diff HEAD~1 HEAD --shortstat | grep deletion)" && npm version major || npm version minor) || echo 'Last commit was not an update to the dataset.'
